• AD_APPLIED_PATCHES • ASE_ROLE_B • FND_GRANTS • Neo BI Report Audit Details_Report • Account Payable • Account Receivable • Assets • Cash Management • General Ledger • Tax • Include C&A screenshots • Query used to pull the listing • Screenshot of the row count of the records and date with time stamp • Tie the row count on the excel export to the records shown in Oracle

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Subject: Automated SNOW Ticket for Quarterly SOX Oracle ERP Change Review

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP Change Review

sys_variable_value.value: Automated SNOW Ticket for Quarterly SOX Oracle ERP Change Review

Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly SOX Oracle ERP Change Review for the Workday application. Please provide your review input by  using the reports provided in SharePoint site “Workday Reviews”. Change Review instructions can be viewed here.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Subject: Quarterly Oracle ERP Change Review.

flow.display_value: SOX Quarterly Oracle ERP Change Review

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly SOX Change Review for the Oracle ERP application. Please provide your review input by 3 - Create Task➛...➛Due date using the reports provided in SharePoint site “Oracle Change Management Reviews”. Change Review instructions can be viewed here. The Oracle Change Review Checklist can be viewed here.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Review Completed. Review all Change comments - Kevin Burke
